slides.subtitle: The first AI-native talent platform for GRC professionals
slides.tagline: Where governance, risk, and compliance careers are built.

slides.heading: The Problem
points: No platform specializes in GRC — recruiters use generic job boards that don't understand domain expertise
GRC professionals lack objective skill validation — certifications alone don't prove competency
Career pathing in GRC is opaque — practitioners don't know which skills to develop next
Employers can't verify GRC depth — résumés don't distinguish CISO-ready from entry-level

slides.heading: The Solution
slides.statement: An AI-powered platform that objectively assesses, develops, and connects GRC talent
points: 6-domain GRC assessments — 25 questions per domain, AI-scored against golden answers
Tier placements — Foundation, Developing, Proficient, Expert across all GRC domains
AI Career Simulator — skill gap analysis, certification ROI, personalized learning paths
Intelligent job matching — domain scores matched to employer requirements

slides.heading: Vision
slides.statement: Become the global standard for GRC career development and talent matching
milestones: 2026: Launch with 6 GRC domains — 5K registered professionals
